Aug. 18, 1951 D Edinburgh International Contest
Edinburgh International Contest 0 March, Hymn and Own Choice Test Piece Contest
edinburgh-international-contest
Princes Street Gardens, Edinburgh March contest - 1st Manchester C.W.S., 2nd Scottish C.W.S.,m 3rd Layland. Hymn tune contest - 1st Manchester C.W.S., 2nd Scottish C.W.S., 3rd Leyland. Deportment - 1st Barrow Shipyard, 2nd Ransone and Marles, 3rd Harton Colliery, 4th Scottish C.W.S. 10 bands competed
Feb. 6, 2011, 8:07 p.m. March 13, 2019, 11:32 a.m.
